DzJsonReader Class Reference

Detailed Description

A class that parses JSON from a QIODevice, this could be a file, or it could be a socket, a memory buffer, etc.

This is a SAX-style parser that reads data from the device one token at a time and immediately passes the data to an interpreter as a JSON element. The parser implements the JSON standard strictly - any data from the device that does not conform to the JSON standard will generate an error, causing the parser to immediately stop and return an appropriate error code. The parser also stops and returns an error if any call to the interpreter fails.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

DzJsonReader::DzJsonReader ( QIODevice *  dev  ) 

General Constructor. Creates a JSON reader that will parse data from the given IO device. The device must already be open and readable.

Parameters:
dev The IO device to read JSON data from.

Destructor.

Member Function Documentation

DzError DzJsonReader::read ( IDzJsonIO *  interpreter  ) 

Parses all the data from the device into JSON and sends it to the given interpreter.

Parameters:
interpreter The interpreter that will receive the parsed JSON. The reader does not take ownership of this object - it is up to the caller to appropriately create and destroy it.
